english_example_sentence: When you sit at the table, please eat your food.
russian_example_sentence: Когда ты садишься за стол, пожалуйста, ешь свою еду.
turkish_example_sentence: Sen masaya oturduğunda, lütfen yemeğini hemen ye.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Sen masaya ______, lütfen yemeğini hemen ye.
